title: Israel Urges Evacuation Of New Areas Ahead Of Attack On Hezbollah Targets
content: The Israeli military on Tuesday issued a new call for residents in southern Beirut to evacuate ahead of a likely strike on alleged Hezbollah targets in the Lebanese armed group's bastion.
summary: The Israeli military on Tuesday issued a new call for residents in southern Beirut to evacuate ahead of a likely strike on alleged Hezbollah targets in the Lebanese armed group's bastion.

title: Kamala Harris Calls Iran "Destabilising, Dangerous" Force In Middle East
content: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic presidential candidate, said on Tuesday that Iran was a "dangerous" and "destabilizing" force in the Middle East and Washington was committed to Israel's security.
summary: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic presidential candidate, said on Tuesday that Iran was a "dangerous" and "destabilizing" force in the Middle East and Washington was committed to Israel's security.

title: Israel's Netanyahu Says "Iran Made A Big Mistake And Will Pay For It"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Iran's missile attack on Israel failed and vowed retaliation.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Iran's missile attack on Israel failed and vowed retaliation.

title: Will Iran's Attack Lead To Full-Scale War? Israeli Spokesman Gives A Hint
content: Israel Defense Forces or IDF is currently assessing the missile attack by Iran today and an appropriate response will be given to Tehran, said Guy Nir, spokesperson of the Israeli embassy in India, speaking exclusively to NDTV.
summary: Israel Defense Forces or IDF is currently assessing the missile attack by Iran today and an appropriate response will be given to Tehran, said Guy Nir, spokesperson of the Israeli embassy in India, speaking exclusively to NDTV.

title: Biden's "Complete Failure" in Middle East: Russia After Iran Attacks Israel
content: Russia on Tuesday said the United States' approach in the Middle East was a "complete failure" after Iran launched a massive missile attack on Israel.
summary: Russia on Tuesday said the United States' approach in the Middle East was a "complete failure" after Iran launched a massive missile attack on Israel.

title: "Decisive Response Has Been Made": Iran President After Attacks On Israel
content: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian hailed Tuesday night's missile attack against Israel as a "decisive response" to what he called Israeli "aggression".
summary: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian hailed Tuesday night's missile attack against Israel as a "decisive response" to what he called Israeli "aggression".

title: Iranian Attack On Israel Was "Defeated And Ineffective': US
content: Iran's ballistic missile assault on Israel was "defeated and ineffective", the White House said on Tuesday, warning that Tehran could expect severe consequences for the attacks.
summary: Iran's ballistic missile assault on Israel was "defeated and ineffective", the White House said on Tuesday, warning that Tehran could expect severe consequences for the attacks.

title: Iran Fired Around 180 Missiles At Israel, Says Israeli Military
content: The Israeli military said Iran fired roughly 180 missiles at the country on Tuesday.
summary: The Israeli military said Iran fired roughly 180 missiles at the country on Tuesday.

title: 'Will Target US Bases If...': Iraq Armed Group After Iran Attacks Israel
content: U.S. bases in Iraq and the region will be targets if the United States joins any response to Iranian strikes on Israel or if Israel uses Iraqi airspace against Tehran, Iranian-backed Iraqi armed groups said on Tuesday.
summary: U.S. bases in Iraq and the region will be targets if the United States joins any response to Iranian strikes on Israel or if Israel uses Iraqi airspace against Tehran, Iranian-backed Iraqi armed groups said on Tuesday.

title: Jimmy Carter Turns 100 - 1st Ever US President To Reach Century Mark
content: Jimmy Carter celebrated his 100th birthday on Tuesday - the first ever US president to reach the century mark and another extraordinary milestone for the one-time peanut farmer who found his way to the White House.
summary: Jimmy Carter celebrated his 100th birthday on Tuesday - the first ever US president to reach the century mark and another extraordinary milestone for the one-time peanut farmer who found his way to the White House.

title: Biden Orders US Military To Shoot Down Iranian Missiles Targeting Israel
content: President Joe Biden has ordered the US military to "aid Israel's defence" and shoot down any and all Iranian missiles targeting Israel, the White House said.
summary: President Joe Biden has ordered the US military to "aid Israel's defence" and shoot down any and all Iranian missiles targeting Israel, the White House said.

title: Video: Israel's Air Defence System In Action To Intercept Iranian Missiles
content: Iran has attacked Israel with missiles and rockets today after tensions escalated in West Asia following artillery and air strikes on Lebanon to target Hezbollah, a Shia militant outfit and a strong ally of Iran.
summary: Iran has attacked Israel with missiles and rockets today after tensions escalated in West Asia following artillery and air strikes on Lebanon to target Hezbollah, a Shia militant outfit and a strong ally of Iran.

title: Iran Guards Threaten "Crushing Attacks" If Israel Responds To Missiles
content: Iran's Revolutionary Guards threatened to carry out "crushing attacks" against regional foe Israel if it retaliated for a missile attack under way on Tuesday.
summary: Iran's Revolutionary Guards threatened to carry out "crushing attacks" against regional foe Israel if it retaliated for a missile attack under way on Tuesday.

title: As Iran Fires Over 180 Missiles At Israel, Indian Embassy Issues Advisory
content: Amid escalating tensions in West Asia (Middle East), the Indian Embassy in Israel has cautioned all Indians to stay vigilant and follow safety protocols advised by local authorities.
summary: Amid escalating tensions in West Asia (Middle East), the Indian Embassy in Israel has cautioned all Indians to stay vigilant and follow safety protocols advised by local authorities.

title: Live: "This Will Have Consequences": Israel After Iran Missile Attack
content: Iran launched missiles at Israel as alarms sounded across the country and Israelis rushed for shelter. Iran said the attack on Israel was a response to the killings of Guards commander and other leaders.
summary: Iran launched missiles at Israel as alarms sounded across the country and Israelis rushed for shelter. Iran said the attack on Israel was a response to the killings of Guards commander and other leaders.

title: "Will Operate At Time, Place We Decide": Israel To Iran After Missile Attack
content: Iran has fired missiles at Israel and all civilians in the country are in bomb shelters, the Israeli military said on Tuesday.
summary: Iran has fired missiles at Israel and all civilians in the country are in bomb shelters, the Israeli military said on Tuesday.

title: 6 Killed In Suspected Shooting, Stabbing Terror Attack In Tel Aviv
content: At least six people were killed and nine wounded in a suspected shooting and stabbing terror attack in Tel Aviv on Tuesday, Israeli police said.
summary: At least six people were killed and nine wounded in a suspected shooting and stabbing terror attack in Tel Aviv on Tuesday, Israeli police said.

title: Painting Found In Cellar Turns Out To Be Original Picasso Worth Rs 50 Crore
content: It's believed that the portrait is of Dora Maar, a French photographer and painter who was Picasso's mistress and muse.
summary: It's believed that the portrait is of Dora Maar, a French photographer and painter who was Picasso's mistress and muse.

title: As Israeli Jets Hit Beirut, People Flee To Sleep On The Beach
content: The repeated blasts in Beirut's southern suburbs where Israel has been carrying out airstrikes this week have driven Zeina Nazha and her young daughter to camp on a city beach seeking safety from the war in Lebanon.
summary: The repeated blasts in Beirut's southern suburbs where Israel has been carrying out airstrikes this week have driven Zeina Nazha and her young daughter to camp on a city beach seeking safety from the war in Lebanon.

title: Explained: How 'The Quad' Faces A Big Challenge By China-Led Unnamed Bloc
content: The Quad, a strategic security grouping which was formed to maintain peace, stability and freedom of navigation in the Indo-Pacific region, is facing a major challenge from an unofficial, unnamed alliance led by China.
summary: The Quad, a strategic security grouping which was formed to maintain peace, stability and freedom of navigation in the Indo-Pacific region, is facing a major challenge from an unofficial, unnamed alliance led by China.
